Text: DO NOT DOWNLOAD once installed disables security center and firewall, and infects with at least two trojans. uploader is a total dick DO NOT DOWNLOAD

Any of you are considering downloading this cracked game...

You will risk getting yourself banned forever from Steam... I noticed that there is anti-priacy feature that checks the Activation Key against the one in secured database...  If there is stolen keys detected in the account... they will ban you instantly!! 

Also, there is problem with cracked games  AV software will probably alert you of it and delete it automatically.
